verses.verse: God <S%G2316><s%>, having of old <S%G4181>time<s%> <S%G2980>spoken<s%> unto the <S%G3962>fathers<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> divers portions <S%G2532>and<s%> in divers <S%G4187>manners<s%>,

hath <S%G2980><s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G2078>end<s%> of <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2980>spoken<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> his <S%G5207>Son<s%>, <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G5087>appointed<s%> <S%G2818>heir<s%> of all <S%G3956>things<s%>, <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> he <S%G4160>made<s%> the <S%G165>worlds<s%>;

who <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> the <S%G541>effulgence<s%> <S%G1391>of<s%> his <S%G1391>glory<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the very <S%G5481>image<s%> <S%G5287>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5287>substance<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G5342>upholding<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> by the <S%G4487>word<s%> <S%G1411>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%>, when he had4160, 1223, 1438 made <S%G2512>purification<s%> <S%G2257>of<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%>, sat <S%G2523>down<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the right <S%G1188>hand<s%> of the <S%G3172>Majesty<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G5308>high<s%>;

having <S%G1096>become<s%> by so <S%G5118>much<s%> <S%G2909>better<s%> than the <S%G32>angels<s%>, <S%G3745>as<s%> he hath <S%G2816>inherited<s%> a more <S%G1313>excellent<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> <S%G846>they<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> unto <S%G5101>which<s%> of the <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> he at any <S%G4218>time<s%>, <S%G4771>Thou<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%>, This <S%G4594>day<s%> <S%G1080>have<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1080>begotten<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>? <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> will <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> a <S%G5207>Son<s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> he <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1521>bringeth<s%> in the <S%G4416>firstborn<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3625>world<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4352>let<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> of4314, Ezekiel3 the <S%G32>angels<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%>, <S%G3588>Who<s%> <S%G4160>maketh<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G4151>winds<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3011>ministers<s%> a <S%G5395>flame<s%> of <S%G4442>fire<s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4314>of<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> he <S%G4675>saith<s%>, Thy <S%G2362>throne<s%>, O <S%G2316>God<s%>, is <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever<s%>; And the <S%G4464>sceptre<s%> of <S%G2118>uprightness<s%> is the <S%G4464>sceptre<s%> <S%G932>of<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%>.

Thou hast <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3404>hated<s%> <S%G458>iniquity<s%>; Therefore1223, 5124 <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, hath <S%G5548>anointed<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> With the <S%G1637>oil<s%> of <S%G20>gladness<s%> <S%G3844>above<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3353>fellows<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%>, <S%G4771>Thou<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2596>in<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> didst lay the <S%G2311>foundation<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G5495>of<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%>:

They <S%G846><s%> shall <S%G622>perish<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1265>continuest<s%>: <S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G3956>all<s%> shall wax <S%G3822>old<s%> as <S%G5613>doth<s%> a <S%G2440>garment<s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5616>as<s%> a <S%G4018>mantle<s%> shalt thou <S%G1667>roll<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1667>up<s%>, As a <S%G2532>garment<s%>, and they shall be <S%G236>changed<s%>: <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> <S%G1587>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1587>fail<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4314>of<s%> <S%G5101>which<s%> of the <S%G32>angels<s%> hath he <S%G2046>said<s%> at any <S%G4218>time<s%>, <S%G2521>Sit<s%> thou <S%G1537>on<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> right <S%G1188>hand<s%>, Till2193, Leviticus2 I <S%G5087>make<s%> <S%G4675>thine<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%> the <S%G5286>footstool<s%> of <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%>?

Are <S%G1526>they<s%> <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3010>ministering<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%>, sent <S%G649>forth<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> do <S%G3010>service<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the sake of them <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G3195>shall<s%> <S%G2816>inherit<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%>?
